page.title: 14HOME LIFE
page.content: {The Kitchen}is the room where food is prepared,and,if there is not a utility room in the house,where the laundry is done.The kitchen is almost always furnished with lots of cupboards and draws, for storing food and utensils, and a stainless steel sink and draining board.The floor is often covered with lino,cork or ceramic tiles,so that it can be kept clean easily.It is also usual to find the following in the kitchen :_ a gas or electric cooker, a refridgerator,a freezer, and an electric washing machine, or spin dryer. Other smaller gadgets that are common_place are :_ an electric toaster,an electric kettle,a food mixer,and a coffee maker.Also,a variety of crockery,cutlery,saucepans, and cookery books.
